About Us

Founded in 2020, we are an investment fund and tech advisory firm focused on tech startups

Investment Fund Portfolio

Traditional Financial Bonds

We invest in high-quality traditional financial bonds, providing a stable income foundation for our portfolio through rigorous credit analysis and risk assessment. We focus on diversified fixed-income products including government bonds and corporate bonds.

Cryptocurrency Lending

This is our core focus area. We provide professional cryptocurrency lending services through Bitfinex, creating value for both borrowers and lenders through smart contract technology and risk management mechanisms.

Bitfinex Lending

Our primary platform for crypto lending operations, offering secure and efficient lending services.

Investment Strategy

  • ▹Diversified asset allocation balancing risk and return
  • ▹Strict risk management and compliance review
  • ▹Continuous market research and investment opportunity discovery
  • ▹Transparent investment reporting and performance tracking

Tech Advisory

Early-Stage AI Application Incubation

We focus on identifying and nurturing promising AI application startups. From proof of concept to product-market fit, we provide comprehensive support including technical guidance, market strategy, and funding connections.

Business Model Optimization

We help tech companies optimize their business models to enhance market competitiveness and profitability. Through technology equity exchange partnerships, we establish long-term strategic partnerships with startups for mutual growth and development.

Service Offerings

  • ▹AI technology application consulting and architecture design
  • ▹Business model optimization and market positioning strategy
  • ▹Early-stage investment and resource connections
  • ▹Technology equity partnerships and long-term strategic planning
  • ▹Team building and talent referrals

Our Values

Innovation

Continuously exploring possibilities in new technologies and business models

Trust

Building long-term stable partnerships and mutual trust

Growth

Growing together with partners to create long-term value
